description: Display active TCP connections, ports on which the computer is listening, network adapter statistics, the IP routing table, IPv4 statistics and IPv6 statistics. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/netstat.

useCases.description: Display all active TCP connections and the TCP and UDP ports on which the computer is listening:
Display network adapter statistics, such as the number of bytes and packets sent and received:
Display active TCP connections and express addresses and port numbers numerically:
Display active TCP connections and include the process ID (PID) for each connection:
Display the contents of the IP routing table:
Display a list of currently open ports and related IP addresses:
